VPCC2D
----------

.. automodule:: classes

This class represents a planar soft body under the Volumetric Piecewise Constant Curvature (VPCC) hypothesis with elongation.
It is used in Simulation 1 of :cite:p:`pustina2023univeral`. See :cite:p:`pustina2023univeral` for the strain and radius models. 

.. autoclass:: VPCC2D
    :show-inheritance:
    :members:
